item.description:
I discovered this wonderful gem of a restaurant in Wellesley that serves delicious Turkish food.  It's small and intimate and the kind of place where you bring your own alcoholic beverages if you choose to.

Because it's a small venue, I've limited the guest list to 7 people and will make reservations as we get close to the date.

Check them out at www.cafemangal.com.
item.why: Let's get away from the snow and cold and imagine ourselves traversing the Bosphore, Mediterranean and Aegean seas....oh wishful dreaming....instead how about we have as close an experience by having dinner at a wonderful Turkish restaurant?

group.name: Boston Baby Boomers Meetup Group-Social Fun

item.name: Turkish Dinner on a Thursday Night
